h1.strong: APRIL 27,2020 VIRTUAL BOARD MEETING DETAILS CLICK HERE

div.p: The School District of North Fond du Lac is currently closed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Students in grades K-12 will participate in Digital Learning from home during this closure.
Looking for something else? Email khoff@nfdlschools.org

img.alt: Students, Faculty, and Staff Welcome You

div.div: Students, Faculty, and Staff Welcome You

div.h1: The School District of North Fond du Lac
div.p: Working Together for the Success of All!

h3.strong: The School District of North Fond du Lac,

div.p: in cooperation with the community, is committed to providing an outstanding educational program in a safe and nurturing environment built upon mutual trust and respect, and designed so all individuals become lifelong learners.
Promote a Happy Culture for ALL
Maximize Student Learning in Literacy for ALL
Provide High Quality Instruction for ALL - Focus: Feedback to Students
